{{NCAATeamFootballSeason |Year=1974 |Team=California Golden Bears |Image= |Conference=Pacific-8 Conference |Division= |ShortConference=Pac-8 |Record= 7-3-1 |ConfRecord= 4-2-1 |CoachRank= |APRank= |HeadCoach=[[Mike White (American football)|Mike White]] |OffCoach= |DefCoach= |OScheme= |DScheme= |Stadium= |Champion= |BowlTourney= |BowlTourneyResult= }} {{1974 Pacific-8 football standings}} The '''1974 California Golden Bears football team''' represented the [[University of California, Berkeley]] in the [[1974 college football season]]. The Golden Bears scored 276 points while the defense allowed 213 points. Led by head coach [[Mike White (American football)|Mike White]], the Golden Bears finished with an 7-3-1 record. The Golden Bears did not participate in a bowl game.
